resources.string: I am Pica, a magpie. I can bring you images from the past.
Click the button and tell me a location. I will fly to the Past
Shall I fly to the garden of human memories and bring pictures of
The noise demon, Bazooka, who hates silence and human voice succeeded in disrupting our communication. Could you speak the location again?
FlickR, the guardian, help me in finding images of
in the garden of human memories in the invisible land of the Past.
